snippet: Martin Kaymer won the PGA Grand Slam of Golf in Bermuda on the first playoff hole as he made a 10-foot birdie and Bubba Watson missed a putt from 4 feet.
abstract: Martin Kaymer wins the PGA Grand Slam of Golf in Bermuda on the first playoff hole.
lead_paragraph: Martin Kaymer won the PGA Grand Slam of Golf in Bermuda on the first playoff hole as he made a 10-foot birdie and Bubba Watson missed a putt from 4 feet.
